JdbcTableListener
ListenersListenerJDBC
Database Listener that operates on a table having at least a key and a status field.
See also
Github - JdbcTableListener Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jdbc.JdbcTableListener
Syntax
Copy
<JdbcTableListener tableName="" statusField="" statusValueError="" statusValueProcessed=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
tableName	text	-
Name of the table to be used
statusField	text	-
Field containing the status of the message. NB: For optimal performance, an index should exist that starts with this field, followed by all fields that are used with a fixed value in the select condition, and end with the orderField.
statusValueError	text	-
Value of statusField indicating the processing of the row resulted i
